plugin.name: Allowed Uploads
Sallitut tiedostomuodot
plugin.summary: Allowed Uploads plugin enables to choose the filetypes that are allowed when submitting a manuscript.
Tämän lisäosan avulla voit rajoittaa niitä tiedostomuotoja, joita voi lähettää käsikirjoituksen yhteyteen.
plugin.description:
Allowed Uploads plugin enables to choose the filetypes that are allowed when submitting a manuscript.

NOTE! This is not a security plugin! Please make sure that the files directory is outside the web root.

Tämän lisäosan avulla voit rajoittaa niitä tiedostomuotoja, joita voi lähettää käsikirjoituksen yhteyteen.

HUOM! Tätä lisäosaa ei ole tarkoitettu parantamaan järjestelmän tietoturvaa! Huolehdi, että järjestelmän tiedostot-hakemisto on sijoitettu tai suojattu oikein.

plugin.name: Authors History
Historia de los autores
Histórico dos autores
plugin.summary: This plugin adds a tab in the submission view, where all submissions from each contributor are listed.
Este módulo agrega una pestaña en la vista de envío, donde se enumeran todos los envíos de cada colaborador.
Este plugin adiciona uma aba na visualização da submissão, onde todos as submissões de cada contribuidor são listadas.
plugin.description: This plugin adds a tab in the submission view, where all submissions from each contributor are listed.
Este complemento agrega una pestaña en la vista de envío, donde se enumeran todos los envíos de cada colaborador.
Este plugin adiciona uma guia na visualização da submissão, onde todos as submissões de cada contribuidor são listadas

maintainer.name: SciELO Brazil Online Submission and Preprints Unit

release.description: This is the first release of this plugin to be sent to PKP Plugin Gallery. Its main functionality is to add a tab in the submission view where all submission from each contributor are listed.

Esta es la primera versión de este módulo que se envía a la Galería de módulos de PKP. Su funcionalidad principal es agregar una pestaña en la vista de envío donde se enumeran todos los envíos de cada colaborador.

Esta é a primeira versão deste plugin a ser enviada para a galeria de plugins da PKP. Sua principal funcionalidade é adicionar uma guia na visualização da submissão, onde todos as submissões de cada contribuidor são listadas.
This release fixes a bug that occurred when deleting one of the previous submissions from one of the submission's authors
Esta versión corrige un error que se produjo al eliminar uno de los envíos anteriores de uno de los autores del envío
Essa versão corrige um problema que ocorria quando se excluia uma das submissões passadas de um dos autores da submissão
Improves plugin's performance and adds checking for cases in which different authors use the same email.
Mejora el rendimiento del módulo y agrega verificación cuando diferentes autores usan el mismo correo electrónico.
Melhora performance do plugin e adiciona verificação para quando diferentes autores usam o mesmo e-mail.

plugin.name: Plugins update notification
Notificación de actualización de módulos
Notificação de atualização de plugins
plugin.summary: This plugin generates a notification whenever an update to a gallery plugin is available
Este módulo genera una notificación cada vez que se encuentra disponible una actualización de un módulo de la galería
Este plugin gera uma notificação sempre que há uma atualização disponível de um plugin da galeria
plugin.description: This plugin generates a notification in the Website Settings informing which plugins have an upgrade available at the plugin gallery
Este complemento genera una notificación en los Ajustes del sítio web que informa qué módulos tienen una actualización disponible en la galería de módulos
Esse plugin gera uma notificação nas Configurações do Website informando quais plugins possuem uma atualização disponível através da galeria de plugins

maintainer.name: SciELO Brazil Online Submission and Preprints Unit

release.description: This is the first release of this plugin to be sent to PKP Plugin Gallery. Its main functionality is to add a notification in the Website Settings informing which plugins have an upgrade available.

Esta es la primera versión de este módulo que se envía a la Galería de módulos de PKP. Su principal funcionalidad es agregar una notificación en los Ajustes del sítio web informando qué módulos tienen una actualización disponible.

Esta é a primeira versão deste plugin a ser enviada à Galeria de Plugins da PKP. Sua principal funcionalidade é adicionar uma notificação nas Configurações do Website, informando quais plugins possuem uma atualização disponível.

plugin.name: Content Analysis
Análisis del contenido
Análise de Conteúdo
plugin.summary: This plugin checks the content of the submitted document for certain submission information and metadata
Este módulo verifica el contenido del documento de envío en busca de cierta información de envío y metadatos
Este plugin verifica o conteúdo do documento da submissão em busca de certas informações e metadados da submissão
plugin.description: This plugin checks the content of the submitted document for certain submission information and metadata. Then, it shows a report of which elements had been found on the submission page.
Este módulo verifica el contenido del documento de envío en busca de cierta información de envío y metadatos. Luego muestra un informe de los elementos que se encontraron en la página de envío.

Este plugin verifica o conteúdo do documento da submissão em busca de certas informações e metadados da submissão. Então, ele exibe um relatório de quais elementos foram encontrados na página da submissão.

maintainer.name: SciELO Brazil Online Submission and Preprints Unit

plugin.summary: An official theme designed to maximize legibility and content clarity.
plugin.description:
An official theme designed for health science journals or any journal that wants a clean, modern appearance. The theme features a light grey-blue color scheme that evokes medical settings, but the color can be changed to fit any journal's needs.

Health Sciences theme was designed and developed by Sophy Ouch, Nate Wright, Vitalii Bezsheiko, John Willinsky, and Kevin Stranack.

plugin.name: Crossref Reference Linking Plugin
plugin.summary: Automatically add the extracted article references to the DOI registration with Crossref
plugin.description:
This plugin will automatically add the extracted article references to the DOI registration with Crossref. Crossref will then automatically check if any DOIs can be found for the submitted references. Shortly after that, using the scheduled task, the plugin will check for the found references DOIs. If article references change once they are registered, the article DOI with the new references will have to be registered anew. Then the check for the found references DOIs will be done again.

This plugin requires Crossref DOIs to be assigned to articles, article references to be separately entered and extracted, as well as article DOIs to be deposited to Crossref from within OJS. It uses the Crossref Export/Registration plugin settings: Crossref credentials (username and password), as well as the setting for the testing mode.

release.description: This is the initial release of the plugin.
Maintenance release of the plugin for OJS 3.3.0.
Bugfix release of the plugin for OJS 3.3.0

plugin.name: Immersion
plugin.summary: An official theme focused on full-page visuals, large typefaces, and bold color blocks.
plugin.description:
The Immersion theme emphasizes the reading experience and offers bold design options such as a full-width header image and per-section color choices. This theme may work best for arts and culture journals which want to present a more ambitious visual profile.

Immersion theme was designed and developed by Sophy Ouch, Vitalii Bezsheiko, John Willinsky, and Kevin Stranack.

plugin.name: Lens Viewer for Monographs and Journal Articles
plugin.summary: An extended version of the Lens Viewer that supports books and articles.
plugin.description:
This plugin provides an extended version of the Lens Viewer with support for books with BITS extensions. It also supports articles.

Do not use this plugin alongside the official Lens Viewer plugin. Only use one or the other, depending on your needs.

release.description: Initial release.
OJS 3.1.2 : Image support
OJS 3.2 : Image support
Update article fetch for 3.2 compatibility

plugin.name: ReviewerCredits Plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin enable the integration with ReviewerCredits (www.reviewercredits.com).
plugin.description: This plugin enable the integration with ReviewerCredits using REST APIs. The main goal is to create and approve Peer Review Claims on the ReviewerCredits website.

release.description: Plugin to enable the integration with ReviewerCredits.
Plugin to enable the integration with ReviewerCredits.
Plugin to enable the integration with ReviewerCredits.

plugin.name: Email Issue Table of Contents
plugin.summary: This plugin embeds the table of contents within the default notification email sent when publishing an issue.
plugin.description: This plugin embeds the table of contents within the default notification email sent when publishing an issue.

release.description: Release of the emailIssueToc plugin for OJS 3.2, with English, German, and Italian locales.
Release of the emailIssueToc plugin for OJS 3.2.
Release of the emailIssueToc plugin for OJS 3.1.

plugin.name: EditorialBio plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin exposes the editorial biographies as pages, as used to be the case with OJS 2.x.
plugin.description: The endpoint {journal_path}/about/editorialTeamBio/{user_id} will respond to display a public editorial bio page, if data is entered in the biography for an editor or journal manager.

release.description: Release of the Editorial Bio plugin for OJS 3.1/3.2.

plugin.name: Clam Antivirus plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin scans submission files using Clam Antivirus, blocking files with a known virus signature.
plugin.description: When uploading a submission file through the Author Submission Steps, or via the Editorial interface, or via the Review process, the submission file will be scanned. If a virus is detected, the upload will be canceled and warning notification will be displayed.

release.description: Release of the ClamAV plugin for OJS 3.1/3.2.

plugin.name: Plum Analytics Artifact Widget
plugin.summary: This plugin integrates Plum Analytics' Artifact Widget.
plugin.description: This plugin provides display of PlumX Metrics from Plum Analytics on the article level for PKP Open Journal Systems.

release.description: Release of the Plum Analytics plugin for OJS 3.1.1/3.1.2.
Release of the Plum Analytics plugin for OJS 3.1/3.2.
Legacy release of the Plum Analytics plugin for OJS 3.1.
Release of the Plum Analytics plugin for OJS 3.2+.

plugin.name: SUSHI-Lite
plugin.summary: This plugin adds SUSHI-Lite (draft) support.
plugin.description: This plugin provides the NISO SUSHI-Lite standard (2015 draft release) for PKP software.

release.description: Release of the SUSHI-Lite plugin for OJS 3.1.1/3.1.2.
Release of the SUSHI-Lite plugin for OJS 3.1/3.2.

plugin.name: Better Password
plugin.summary: This plugin adds user restrictions when selecting passwords.
plugin.description: This plugin provides additional password restriction options when users are selecting their own password. Please review the NIST recommendations in the README before using arbitrary password complexity requirements.

release.description: Release of the Better Password plugin for OJS/OMP 3.1.2.
Release of the Better Password plugin for OJS/OMP 3.2.1.
Release of the Better Password plugin for OJS/OMP/OPS 3.3

plugin.name: Sitesearch
plugin.summary: This plugin forces public searches for a context to be re-scoped to the site.
plugin.description: This plugin rewrites the search for a context to the site level. This is used, for example, in the case where one journal has assumed the operations of one or more other journals (which are installed in the same site).

release.description: Release of the Sitesearch plugin for OJS/OMP 3.1 / 3.2 and OPS 3.2.

plugin.name: Akismet
plugin.summary: This plugin integrates the Akismet anti-spam service.
plugin.description: This plugin verifies new user registrations via the Akismet anti-spam service. Subscription to Akismet is required.

release.description: Release of the Akismet plugin for OJS 3.1.1 and OJS/OMP 3.1.2.
Release of the Akismet plugin for OJS/OMP 3.1 / 3.2 and OPS 3.2.
Release of the Akismet plugin for OJS/OMP/OPS 3.3

plugin.name: Form Honeypot
plugin.summary: This plugin adds a honeypot to user registration.
plugin.description: This plugin verifies new user registrations by creating a honeypot on the User Registration form.

release.description: Release of the Form Honeypot plugin for OJS 3.1.1/3.1.2.
Release of the Form Honeypot plugin for OJS 3.2+.

plugin.name: Author Requirements
plugin.summary: Make certain author fields optional.
plugin.description: This plugin makes it possible to add an author to a list of contributors without using certain required fields (e.g. email). This is useful in cases where required information does not exist for authors.

release.description: Initial release of the authorRequirements plugin for OJS/OMP 3.1.x
Release of the authorRequirements plugin for OJS/OMP 3.2.0
Release of the authorRequirements plugin for OJS/OMP 3.3.0
Update to authorRequirements plugin fixing compatability issues in OMP 3.3
Updated for cross-application compatibility.

plugin.name: Registration Notification
plugin.summary: Sends an email notification to a configurable list of emails whenever a new user is registered.
plugin.description:
Once enabled, the plugin will send an email notification to a configurable list of emails, configurable per journal/press, whenever a new user is registered. The plugin also supports setting up the email template using variables.

See https://github.com/pkp/registrationNotification/blob/master/README.md for details.

release.description: Registration Notification Plugin v1.0.0.2 (Compatible with OJS/OMP 3.1.1).
Registration Notification Plugin v2.0.0.1 (Compatible with OJS/OMP 3.1.2).

plugin.name: Control Public Files
plugin.summary: Limit who can upload public files and what kind of files they can upload.
plugin.description:
Users can upload images wherever they are presented with a rich text editor that includes the image upload control. This includes places like the About the Journal section as well as the user biography in every user's profile area.

This plugin provides settings to restrict who can upload, what kind of files they can upload, and how large their directory of files can grow.

release.description: Initial release for OJS/OMP v3.2.
Maintenance release for OJS/OMP v3.2.1.
This update adds translations for Finnish, Norwegian, Czech, Greek, and Vietnamese.

plugin.name: Text Editor Extras
plugin.summary: Add controls to the rich text editor to upload images, manipulate the HTML code, and add tables.
plugin.description: This plugin provides settings to turn on extra controls for the rich text editor and to specify which fields should receive the additional controls.

release.description: Initial release for OJS/OMP v3.2.
This update fixes a bug that prevented image uploads from working in some configurations.
Maintenance release for OJS/OPS/OMP 3.2.1.
This update adds translations for Arabic, Spanish and Ukrainian.
This update adds support for extra text editor options in the announcements form.

plugin.name: Twitter Block Plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin adds a block to display a Twitter feed in the sidebar.
plugin.description:
This plugin makes it easy to include Twitter feeds in a multi-journal instance without the need to create several custom blocks.

Check the how to use guide.

release.description: Initial release
Added a message to remind administrators to make an appropriate entry in the cookie policy.
Spanish translation added
Spanish translation added

plugin.name: Announcements Block
plugin.summary: This plugin adds a block to display announcements in the sidebar.
plugin.description:
This plugin makes it easy to show the latest announcements in the sidebar. It allows you to specify how many announcements are displayed.

Check the "how to use" guide on GitHub

maintainer.name: Ronny Bölter
maintainer.institution: Leibniz Institute for Psychology (ZPID), Trier, Germany

release.description: Initial release
Settings for text alignment added
Settings for text alignment added

plugin.name: Sword Server Plugin
plugin.summary: Permits the use of the SWORD protocol to receive deposits from other applications.
plugin.description: This plugin permits the use of the SWORDv2 protocol to allow OJS to receive deposit documents from other systems.

release.description: Initial release
Maintenance release for OJS 3.2.1

plugin.name: Public Identifier Resolver
plugin.summary: Allows resolving the URL of an issue, article and galley from your public identifier registered in OJS.
plugin.description: The Public Identifier Resolver plugin resolves individual articles, issues and galleys in the current OJS installation using the supplied public identifier register in OJS. The public identifier can be DOI, URN, ARK, PURL, etc. Also, It can obtain the element metadata using the format ERC adding question marks at the end of the persistent identifier. ERC format includes the metadata who, what, when, where, how and target.

release.description: Initial release

plugin.name: Returning Author Screening Plugin
plugin.summary: Permits authors who already have at least one published submission to self-publish subsequent submissions.
plugin.description: This plugin permits authors who already have at least one published submission to self-publish subsequent submissions.

release.description: Initial release

plugin.name: Open Graph Plugin
Open Graph -lisäosa
plugin.summary: Open Graph Plugin presents published content using the Open Graph protocol.
Open Graph -lisäosa esittää metadatan Open Graph -protokollan mukaisessa muodossa.
plugin.description: Open Graph Plugin presents published content using the Open Graph protocol. Open Graph tags are used when you content is shared in Facebook
Open Graph -lisäosa esittää metadatan Open Graph -protokollan mukaisessa muodossa. Tietoja käytetään, kun julkaistua sisältöä jaetaan Facebookissa.

maintainer.name: Antti-Jussi Nygård
maintainer.institution: The Federation of Finnish Learned Societies

release.description: Initial release of the Open Graph Plugin.
OpenGraph plugin for 3.3

plugin.name: Publons Reviewer Recognition Plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin enables integration with Publons Reviewer Recognition Service.
plugin.description: In order to provide your reviewers with the opportunity to gain recognition for their reviews on Publons, please register your interest with Publons by visiting https://publons.com/benefits/publishers. Our accounts team will then be in touch to discuss your options and provide further instructions on how to integrate your journal with Publons.

release.description: Fix compatibility issues with OJS v3.3. Fixed the send reviews button for already sent reviews.
Fix compatibility issues with OJS v3.2.0. Reset versioning to use calendar versioning.
Minor improvements for Portuguese translations.

plugin.name: Pragma
plugin.summary: An official theme for OJS 3.
plugin.description:
A minimalist OJS theme inspired by early periodicals’ tables of contents featuring a bold use of a monochromatic colour palette.

Pragma theme was designed and developed by Sophy Ouch, Vitalii Bezsheiko, John Willinsky, and Kevin Stranack.

release.description: Initial release.

This update fixes a bug that would show unpublished issues on the homepage. It also implements a number of minor fixes and style improvements. Full details available at https://github.com/pkp/pragma/releases/tag/v1_0_0-1.
This release updates a theme to be compatible with OJS 3.3.0.1, fixes display of multilingual keywords on article landing page as well as displays article's license terms

plugin.name: Archivematica Export
plugin.summary: Exports articles or issues to Archivematica for its preservation.
plugin.description: This plugin allows you to export articles or full numbers from OJS to an installation of Archivematica preservation software.

release.description: Initial release for OJS 3.1.0.x/3.1.1.x.
Initial release for OJS 3.1.2.x.

plugin.name: PKP|PN (PKP Preservation Network) Plugin
plugin.summary: Supports preservation of published journal content in the PKP Preservation Network.
plugin.description:
This plugin enables the automatic preservation of published journal content in the PKP Preservation Network (PKP|PN).

Note: This plugin requires ZipArchive support. See https://www.php.net/manual/en/zip.installation.php for details.

release.description: PKP|PN for OJS 3.1.2-x.
PKP|PN for OJS 3.2.0-x.
PKP|PN for OJS 3.2.1-x.
PKP|PN for OJS 3.3.0-x.
PKP|PN for OJS 3.3.0-x.

plugin.name: Scopus/Crossref Citations Plugin
plugin.summary: Shows the total number of citations and a "cited by" article list from Scopus and/or Crossref.
plugin.description:
This plugin uses the DOI of an article to get all citations from Scopus and/or Crossref. Google Scholar and PubMed are also supported. The count and list of citations is displayed in the sidebar of the article details. It is possible to choose between the different providers and display only the amount of results if the list is not desired.

For more information check GitHub

maintainer.name: Ronny Bölter
maintainer.institution: Leibniz Institute for Psychology (ZPID), Trier, Germany

release.description: Scopus/Crossref Citations Plugin for OJS 3.1.2-x.
Scopus/Crossref Citations Plugin for OJS 3.2.0-x.
This releases fixes a minor bug that occurred on an empty API response.
Release for OJS 3.2 and 3.3. Fixes a minor bug that occurred on an empty API response.
Spanish translation added.
Spanish translation added and curl replaced with Guzzle
Added Crossref contact information to request permission to use the cited-by service.

plugin.name: Portico Plugin
plugin.summary: Supports export of published content to Portico.
plugin.description:
This plugin enables the digital preservation of published content in the Portico preservtion service.

Note: This plugin requires ZipArchive support. See https://www.php.net/manual/en/zip.installation.php for details.

release.description: Portico for OJS 3.1.2-x.
Portico for OJS 3.2.x.
Portico for OJS 3.1.2-x.
Portico for OJS 3.2.x.
Portico for OJS 3.2.x.
Portico for OJS 3.3.x.

plugin.name: Research Organization Registry(ROR) Plugin
plugin.summary: OJS 3 Plugin for adding Organization names for author affiliations provided by ROR.org
plugin.description:
The ROR plugin integrates support for ROR. Organizations maintained by ROR.org are automatically fetched using an auto suggesting function. For multilingual journals, additionally supported languages will be pre-filled given, ROR.org has the corresponding names in the OJS supported languages.

>

maintainer.name: Dulip Withanage
maintainer.institution: German National Library of Science and Technology (TIB), Hannover, Germany

Adds support for OPS 3.3

plugin.name: DOI to mEDRA xml export and registration plugin
plugin.summary: Allows DOI export in ONIX4DOI format and the registration with mEDRA.
plugin.description: The mEDRA plugin enables the export of issue, article and galley metadata in ONIX4DOI format and the registration of DOIs with mEDRA.

release.description: mEDRA plugin for OJS 3.3.0-x

plugin.name: OpenID Authentication Plugin
plugin.summary: This plugin allows users to register and login with an OpenID Connect provider such as Keycloak, Google, Orchid, Microsoft and Apple
plugin.description:
This plugin enables logging in to PKP applications using OpenID Connect providers. It currently supports Google, Apple ID, Microsoft Azure AD and Orchid. It is also possible to configure a custom OpenID Connect provider such as Keycloak.

For more information check GitHub
Read the wiki if you need help with the configuration.

maintainer.name: Ronny Bölter
maintainer.institution: Leibniz Institute for Psychology (ZPID), Trier, Germany

release.description: OpenID plugin for OJS 3.3.0-x (first release)
Registration as reviewer added. Review interest added. PHP warning fixed

plugin.name: Datacite
plugin.summary: This plugin allows DOI registration via Datacite

release.description: Initial Release of Datacite plugin for OMP 3.1.x.
Datacite plugin for OMP 3.3.0

plugin.name: Browse By Section Plugin
plugin.summary: A plugin which allows visitors to browse published articles by section.
plugin.description: This plugin allows the journal to configure new public facing pages for each journal section, which list the published articles in that section by publication date or by title.

release.description: Browse By Section for OJS 3.3 (first release)
Browse By Section for OJS 3.1.2 (first release)
Browse By Section for OJS 3.3 (first release)

plugin.name: SciELO Submissions Report
Relatorio de Envíos de SciELO
Relatório de Submissões SciELO
plugin.summary: This plugin generates a CSV spreadsheet with submissions information that is usually requested by SciELO
Este módulo genera un informe CSV con la información de los envíos que normalmente solicita SciELO.
Este plugin gera um relatório CSV com informação das submissões que é normalmente requisitada pela SciELO.
plugin.description: This plugin generates a CSV spreadsheet with information that is usually requested by SciELO, based on the website submissions.
Este módulo genera un informe CSV con información que normalmente solicita SciELO, según los envíos del sitio web.
Este plugin gera um relatório CSV com informações que são normalmente solicitadas pela SciELO, com base nas submissões do website.

maintainer.name: SciELO Brazil Online Submission and Preprints Unit

release.description: Improves UTF-8 enconding support and prevents SQL injections. First release sent to PKP Plugin Gallery.
Mejora la compatibilidad con la codificación UTF-8 y evita las inyecciones de SQL. Primera versión que se enviará a la galería de módulos de PKP.
Melhora suporte a codificação UTF-8 e previne injeções SQL. Primeira versão a ser enviada à galeria de plugins da PKP.
Fixes bug with the report filter by final decision date. This bug affected the submissions included in the report in both OPS and OJS.
Corrige bug con el filtro de la fecha de decisión final. Este error afectó los envíos incluidos en el informe tanto en OPS como en OJS.
Corrige bug com o filtro por data de decisão final. Esse bug afetava as submissões incluidas no relatório tanto no OPS quanto no OJS.
Correction in filtering by submission date that resulted in empty reports
Corrección en el filtrado por fecha de envío que resultó en informes vacíos
Correção na filtragem por data de submissão que resultava em relatórios vazios
Fixes plugin gallery problem, upgrades interface and fixes minor problems
Corrige problema con la galería de módulos, actualiza la interfaz y corrige problemas menores
Corrige problema com a galeria de plugins, atualiza interface e corrige menores problemas
Fixes bad request issue on public site pages.
Soluciona el problema de solicitud incorrecta en las páginas del sitio público.
Corrige problema de má requisição em páginas públicas do site.
This is the first release of this plugin compatible with OJS and OPS in 3.3.0-x versions.
Esta es la primera versión de este módulo compatible con OJS y OPS en las versiones 3.3.0-x.
Esta é a primeira release deste plugin a ser compatível com OJS e OPS nas versões 3.3.0-x.
Adds support for uncovered editor decisions in the Last Decision column and fixes bug that prevented the loading of the Plugins page at Site Settings
Agrega soporte para decisiones editoriales que no se cubrieron en la columna Última decisión y corrige el error que impedía la carga de la página de módulos en la Configuración del sitio
Dá suporte a decisões editoriais que não eram cobertas na coluna da Última Decisão e corrige erro que impedia o carregamento da página de plugins nas Configurações do Portal
Fixes problem that occurred when a submitter didn't have a country filled
Soluciona el problema que se producía cuando el autor que realizaba el envío no tenía la afiliación completa
Corrige problema que ocorria quando o autor submissor não possuía a afiliação preenchida
Increases overall plugin performance. Now it only takes 20% of the time it took to generate the report before.
Aumenta el rendimiento general del módulo. Ahora solo toma el 20% del tiempo que tomaba generar el informe antes.
Aumenta o desempenho geral do plugin. Agora, é necessário apenas 20% do tempo necessário anteriormente para gerar o relatório.

plugin.name: Lucene/Solr Plugin
plugin.summary: Solr/Lucene integration for OJS
plugin.description: This plugins integrates the solr/search for OJS journals. Warning! Integration requires additional configuration . Please see the help page for configuration and we advise to test it on a test installation, before using on a production server.

release.description: Initial Release of Lucene/Solr plugin for OJS 3.2

plugin.name: Bibi Epub Viewer
Visualizador de EPUB Bibi
Visor EPUBs Bibi
plugin.summary: A plugin for viewing embedded EPUBs in Open Journal Systems and Open Monograph Press using Bibi Epub Reader.
Plugin para visualização embutida de EPUBs no Open Journal Systems e Open Monograph Press utilizando o Bibi Epub Reader.
Módulo para visualización incrustada de EPUB en Open Journal Systems y Open Monograph Press con Bibi EPUB Reader.
plugin.description: A plugin for viewing embedded EPUBs in Open Journal Systems and Open Monograph Press using Bibi Epub Reader.
Módulo para visualización incrustada de EPUB en Open Journal Systems y Open Monograph Press con Bibi EPUB Reader.
Plugin para visualização embutida de EPUBs no Open Journal Systems e Open Monograph Press utilizando o Bibi Epub Reader.

release.description: This is the first release of this plugin to be sent to PKP Plugin Gallery. Its main functionality is to display embedded EPUBs files in publications.
Esta es la primera versión de este módulo que se envía a la Galería de módulos de PKP. Su funcionalidad principal es mostrar archivos EPUBs incrustados en publicaciones.
Esta é a primeira versão deste plugin a ser enviada para a galeria de plugins da PKP. Sua principal funcionalidade é exibir arquivos EPUBs embutidos nas publicações.
